findings.title: MT - Mint Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens, which can lead to token inflation and liquidity draining if abused.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase fees over a reasonable limit by calling the `updateFee` function with high percentage values.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions by calling the `blacklistAddress` function.
